problem: Customer experienced issues with order delivery, including delayed and incorrect shipments of items, and had to request cancellation of some orders due to stock needs. problem: Customer is experiencing difficulty placing an order through the mobile application. The issue is related to the order placement process. The customer is unable to complete the order.
